ygData.subject: Re: will-o-wisp
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not that I know of.  No faction messages are given.  What you DO get is good xp and great loot (lightstones and greater lightstones).  Make sure you have a
ygData.messageBody:
> I was wondering if you receive any negative effects, like losing any
> factions,etc, for killing willowisp?
>

Not that I know of. No faction messages are given. What you DO get
is good xp and great loot (lightstones and greater lightstones). Make
sure you have a magic weapon to hit them with, because if you don't
and mana runs out, you're dead as a doornail. Also make sure there's
only one around, because they DO assist and believe me, you don't want
two wisps on you.

Aznyin
Level 13 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
